# 8.0 Docs

## Serialization

- [BinaryFormatter disabled for most projects](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/8.0/binaryformatter-disabled.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in serialization where serialize and deserialize methods on BinaryFormatter now throw an exception at runtime.
- [PublishedTrimmed projects fail reflection-based serialization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/8.0/publishtrimmed.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in System.Text.Json serialization where projects with PublishTrimmed enabled now fail reflection-based serialization by default.
- [Reflection-based deserializer resolves metadata eagerly](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/8.0/metadata-resolving.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in System.Text.Json serialization where the reflection-based deserializer resolves property metadata eagerly.
